thread.title: BRIEF-Donaldson Provides Provisional Estimates Of Impact From Tax Reform, Announces Q2 2018 Earnings Webcast

title: BRIEF-Donaldson Provides Provisional Estimates Of Impact From Tax Reform, Announces Q2 2018 Earnings Webcast
text:
February 7, 2018 / 9:30 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Donaldson Provides Provisional Estimates Of Impact From Tax Reform, Announces Q2 2018 Earnings Webcast Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Donaldson Company Inc: 
* DONALDSON PROVIDES PROVISIONAL ESTIMATES OF IMPACT FROM TAX REFORM, ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER 2018 EARNINGS WEBCAST 
* DONALDSON COMPANY -‍EXPECTS Q2 RESULTS TO INCLUDE PROVISIONAL CHARGE OF ABOUT $110 MILLION RELATED TO DEEMED REPATRIATION OF UNDISTRIBUTED FOREIGN EARNINGS​ 
* DONALDSON COMPANY INC - ‍EXPECTS Q2 RESULTS WILL INCLUDE PROVISIONAL CHARGE OF ABOUT $2 MILLION RELATED TO RE-MEASUREMENT OF CO‘S NET DEFERRED TAX ASSETS​ 
* DONALDSON COMPANY INC - ‍ESTIMATES NET IMPACT FROM TCJA WILL LOWER FULL-YEAR 2018 EFFECTIVE TAX RATE BY APPROXIMATELY 1 PERCENTAGE POINT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
